summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to issue a permit to the owner or owners of Lots 5 and 6, in Block 34, Bell & Denny's 2nd Addition to the City of Seattle, as recorded in Volume 1 of Plats, Page 77, except that portion condemned by Ordinance No. 13776, to construct and maintain a regulation concrete driveway in front of said lots.
